The limbs are a little stretched, but there are tiny fins at the edge of the arms. Along the sides of the head, there are gills. It has a strange glance, looking around like a sentry, almost. It's not undead. It appears to be more of a fish person.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does it look like it has four appendages?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has four appendages. It has arms and legs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. I would have gotten an undead ping from any of them. I didn't get an undead ping?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. What's interesting is that one of its lower appendages, its right leg, as you're watching, curls up and then unfurls. One of its legs seems to move similarly to one of the appendages of Frumpkin.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just one. The others appear to be human.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One person or one limb?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One limb.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's like the snake people on the other island.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's some Cthulhuian shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They all have one octopus tentacle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, the nearest one you saw has. You aren't close enough to the others to make out what their physical representation is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm relaying that to everybody very quietly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where do we go, Fjord?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have five here that are watching. You have to decide, what is it going to be? Is it a brazen attack? Is it some form of a stealth mission? What are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: Quietly.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's a good idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we make a distraction or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're clustered enough around where they're not going to not see you. You have nothing you're hiding behind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can't HALO drop in this bitch?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, a stealth mission in this would be invisibility. You would have to do something where they cannot see you. Otherwise, they're going to see you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Quick and fast?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we can pair up.

lines.name: MARISHA, SAM
lines.text: Buddy system.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I say we all attack each one until each one is dead. We don't spread it out too much.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One at a time?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Focus on--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The people?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or at least two. There's five.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are they for sure going to attack us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pretty sure. They look like they're on the look, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bad? Super bad? There are five?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I could Invoke Duplicity down there and see if they attack us. If they do, then we can attack them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It looks dangerous. I think it's worth--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just going for it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's got a good range? Who's got some good pop on a good range? You?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I can hit for sure, but--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does the water do anything to it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How spread out are they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, they're not a perfect ring of five around the top. They're all hanging right towards the top of the tower from the different layers of seaweed. They're anywhere from 15 to 20 feet from each other. Their arrangement is a bit uneven.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're wrapped up in the seaweed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we sure we want to make a hit on these things that are tangled up, as opposed to this one that is free floating?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There is one that is free?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking at them all, it looks like they're less wrapped and tangled and more like they have an arm or a leg that they've curled around it and are anchoring themselves to it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like seahorses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How close do you need to be, Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not that close.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm more of a fan of them coming to us, frankly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Little over a hundred feet away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's get in range of whatever Caleb needs to do, and then let's break off into three and four.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're not on the floor of the sea? We're above them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're above them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They can pick, but they've got to come to us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, you tell me. As far as I'm concerned, you're calling the shots here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's get within whatever you need. 120 feet? 100 feet? We'll try to stealth within that range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Caduceus has made that journey. As you continue to push in that direction, you get to the exterior of that range. They seem to have not noticed your presence, yet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Spread out. 30 feet between us, the two groups. Clerics with each group.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll stick with you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I will not go with Yasha because Sentinel and Sentinel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll go with Beau.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How about we four and the outside three?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I could either focus what I'm going to do on one of them, or I could tickle all of them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All of them at the same time?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It would just get their attention. It would not solve anything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wizard's choice. How about just one, and you pick?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I begin to weave my hands underwater and cast Magic Missile.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will simultaneously fire a crossbow bolt.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just for fun, I'll add into this with a Sacred Flame.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All towards the same target?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll also send Eldritch Blast.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: See if we can knock one out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm casting at 2nd-level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Those that need to roll attacks, roll attacks. Those that need to roll damage, roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mine is a save against dex of 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mine is also a save against dex of 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 26 and a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 12 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 to hit? Hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 21 points of Eldritch Blast.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 11 points of radiant damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Four beads of energy. Nine-- nein points of damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Another 20 points of damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, 13, excuse me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This entity, breathing under the water, watches this glimmer of arcane energy. Its attention turns up towards it as it releases the seaweed. Then (multiple explosions), and goes limp under the water as a small cloud of its own blood begins to fill the space around it. At which point, the other four look up and notice your presence from the lights that have been glowing and the death of one of its comrades.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Next target, maybe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll initiative.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ooh, not good. Well, not good for them, either. 25 to 20?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that with advantage? Oh.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. That first one was good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cricket.

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: 18. Hey!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 17! Who are you?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Who is this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that's Yasha. 15 to ten?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have to be close.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you get down there and hold an action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your movement is halved when you're swimming, except for Fjord.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Say again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your movement is halved while you're swimming, just so you know. You guys are about a hundred feet away, so it's going to take a little bit to get there for the melee folk.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two. One.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Five total for me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, well then, you top me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dude, what? You rolled a two?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Plus zero.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, you're up first. Caleb and Jester, the four of them now begin to quickly swim up in your direction. They swim fast. They swim faster than you do, at the very least.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, that makes sense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About as fast as Fjord does.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 30 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They look like the Creature from the Black Lagoon, with a little bit of a slight more humanoid nose and mouth. They're now clambering up towards you in the water. What are you guys doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Guiding Bolt at the one coming closest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Same one, or different target?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I'm nibbling on some licorice root, and casting Haste on Fjord, and backing away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Haste on Fjord? Oh my god.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It rolled a natural 20 again on its saving throw! Two natural 20s in a row. Oh no, this is Guiding Bolt, never mind. He doesn't roll anything. Wasted natural 20, Matt. Well done! It's okay. Roll your attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well done. You've already helped.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14? Yeah, that hits. Their armor class is 11.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're going to be trouble when they get in there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, 14 points of radiant damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 points of radiant damage. It bursts and glows underneath. It's still alive. You see the blood splatter, and it has this glowing energy surrounding its torso, making it easy to see in the dark depths below. Awesome, that finished your turn. You cast Haste. That ends your guys' round, and you're backing away. Yasha, your turn.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I am going to move as much as I can, getting closer to them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'd be your full round there. Get you 30 feet down, so you're about 60 or so-- well no, your movement speed is 40, so it's 20, 20. Yeah, you're about 60 feet away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you want to have an action held, though?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. I'm going to hold my action until one of them either-- yeah, they get close to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'll only move 20 feet, then, so you're 80 feet away. Got it, okay. You're holding your action to hit whenever it comes close. All right, that finishes your turn. Caduceus, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to move just behind Yasha. Are any of them within range at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What range?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. They're about a hundred feet away. They haven't taken their turn yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then I'm going to hold a spell until they're within range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What spell are you holding?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to hold Bane.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Finishes your go. Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, me? I'm going to swim-- well, no. I have ranged attacks, so I'm going to just pick one, the one that Jester missed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your interior range with your weapon?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, 30. No, I've been rolling at disadvantage for-- it's 30 or 120 from the Tinkertop Boltblaster. I rolled at disadvantage last time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Underwater?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, because a crossbow you don't roll at disadvantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's ranged disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. Automatically misses a target beyond the weapon's normal range. You don't roll disadvantage for the first half, the first 30 feet, but anything beyond 30 feet is an automatic miss because at that point it loses momentum and can't keep traveling.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, underwater? Oh! I did not know that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which you just learned.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Well then, I didn't hit the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You didn't need to. You guys fucking destroyed it. Before it came to you, it was already dead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It has to be within 30 underwater to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've learned.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I still do disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you do not roll disadvantage if it's ranged.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, got it. I fire and nothing happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It goes (shearing) and just floats.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shit. I'll start going towards it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you swim 15 feet. You can bonus action dash if you want.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, I will bonus action dash to make it 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 feet in, that gets there. Now it's their turn. They all double-move 60 feet as they swim upwards, getting as close as they can. That definitely gets them in range for your spell.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to hit three of them with Bane.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were 80 feet, so no one gets into range with you. So Bane. You're hitting three of them with Bane.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three of them with Bane. It's a charisma saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, there's three of them that have not been hit. There's one that has.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm hitting the ones that have not been hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got it, all right. Saving throw is wisdom?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Charisma.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fail, fail, and fail!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, they were 80 feet away?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They were 80 feet away from you, and they just moved 60 feet. There's 20 feet between the two of you now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, from where I had gotten to with the 20 feet. Got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All three of them fail. All three of them are Baned.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. Attacks and savings throws, 1d4.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got it. Beau, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, shit. Anyone in range?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're about 40 feet from you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh! Yeah, I'll swim-- which one is closest? All of them? All four of them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've hit one of them with Guiding Bolt, and you have advantage against it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take that one. I'll swim.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You swim down. That's 20 feet, so you're still 20 feet away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it just hers at advantage, or all attacks against it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just the first one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I will spend a ki point to do Swim of the Wind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the additional 20 feet. That will get you right into range of the one Jester hit. It's like (snarling). As you get really up close to it now, with the glowing light around it, you get a good look at its face. It's covered in layers of scales and spined points that come out at various points of its facial features. Its eyes are yellow and a sick little side lens that closes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ew. X-Files.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Punch. Jesus Christ.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have advantage because of the Guiding Bolt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, thank you, Jester! Ooh, that's much better. 18?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll use my fist.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was your first roll?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was a three plus seven, so ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten misses. That first strike just-- it's too slow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Second attack. Almost a natural 20, but it wasn't. 13?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's fun!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would it still be at disadvantage, though, on the second attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would be.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck, balls, shit, cock. Still hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's my favorite combo.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Five damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five damage. It's hurt, but it's still going. That's the end of your turn, Beau?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord, you're up. Your speed is 60 underwater, so you can go to any of them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will join Beau, just in case someone decides to fuck around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You Aquaman it through the water towards it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll fire the first two Eldritch Blasts at one of them that's swimming, though not the one that's in melee of her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The first one's going to be at one of the ones that's untouched.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That sucks. That's a one and a two, so I think both of those fucking miss. That's incredible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. Both (whiffing).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're rolling like garbage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll fire the next two--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Next two?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because I'm hasted, so I have a second attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The second attack action can only be used for a single weapon attack or disengage, dash--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so you have to use your sword.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Use your sword!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I guess I'll just--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Attack the one at Beau.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: -- summon the falchion and take a swing at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The falchion comes into your hand. You dash towards which one? The one with Beau or--?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a two. I do nothing. Nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, buddy. Underwater man not feeling very underwater-like right now, unfortunately!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) Shitty rolls!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay. Finishes your go. Top of the round, Caleb and Jester.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, that was easy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going Toll the Dead at the one at Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It makes its saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Negative d4.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right. That's a natural 16--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not that one. That one doesn't have the d4.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was the save?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wisdom. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's 16. Sorry. That finishes your turn, then, or are you going to move closer? Stay put?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to stay put.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you stay put. Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to try to do a bit of a science experiment, and cast Fire Bolt at the one next to Beauregard, and see if it even works down here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. At your range, roll for attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Ah, no. I rolled a two.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the fuck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It travels half the distance, then sputters out, consumed by the ocean.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, so it wouldn't have worked?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I move back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You move back even further. Yasha, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yasha, you better fucking help us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move your 20 feet and get in range for any of them.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to move my 20 feet and get into range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Take your pick. There's three untouched, and there's one that Beau has done some damage to.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll get to it on the other side. I'll get to whichever's closest. They're on the other side, right, of the group?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. I'll get one, whoever's closest to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of those that's untouched yet. It's disadvantage on your attacks with melee underwater.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Unless I reckless.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unless you're reckless, in which case they're straight rolls. Are you reckless?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's do that. I'm reckless.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. First attack, single roll.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, that'll hit. 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 hits. Roll damage. This is your full 3d6.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you raging?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm raging.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, there you go. I'll let you do that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's okay. Remember that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right. 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 points with the first strike. It carves through, immediately filling the water around it with its dark blood as it scrambles around. Looks pretty hurt.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Second attack, I'll hit it again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ugh. Reckless.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, reckless is a single attack.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Got it. That was a natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to keep my distance. I'm going to back up a little bit, and I'm going to use Sacred Flame on the one that is in combat with Yasha. It's dex save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural seven. That's a failure. It has a minus one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I want to do this? Yeah. Five points of radiant damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The burst of light from underneath it hits it. It starts gurgling in pain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was a seven. That wasn't a one. That was a seven and a four.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. My brain is burnt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is holding on by a thread. It is torn asunder, and you can-- bless you. It's obscured by a cloud of its own murky blood right now. That finishes your turn, Caduceus? Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fire at the one next to Beau. 14 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 hits. Roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay. Ten.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's the first time I've heard Sam say "Okay, okay, okay."

lines.name: SAM, ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (impact) It is done.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (crossbow reloading) Bonus action. Shoot the one next to Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That doesn't hit. Only 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 hits exactly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yay. Actually, it's 13. I lied.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Even better! There you go. Definitely hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not sneak attack. I only get that once.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. You only get that once per turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three plus five. Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight damage. One (gurgling); the other one (gurgling). Two immediate fires. Two of them go limp and begin to float in their own ichor. Well done.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I swim closer to Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trying to-- it's been a lot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can call me Yasha. I'll take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to make two attacks against you with its unarmed strike. It's clawing at you with its hands. That is a 12 and a 19.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Miss. Second one hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that with a negative d4?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, no. Let me do that. 18. Misses!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking Bane, man!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: AC 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the third strike, it's going to use its Piscine Anatomy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It has a prehensile penis. Sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ruin everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, one of the other ones, maybe, but that one, no. This one, it strikes twice at you with its claws. Then its throat (bubbling, spitting), and it spits this tiny needle towards you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (exaggerated Southern accent) Careful, they spit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (exaggerated Southern accent) Careful, they spit needles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be 21. Oh, with another negative three. 18.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Miss!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I love Bane so much. Where has it been all my life? Oh! It's so hateful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 minus two, so it's a 17.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 minus three is a 13.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Doesn't hit. So one hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One hits you for six points of piercing damage, as it claws-- or this would be a bite. It grabs and bites towards you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Reduced to half?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, no, it's a strike, so bludgeoning. It's halved to three. You take three points of bludgeoning damage. This one is going to attempt to grab you with the tentacle. Natural 20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does he get a bonus for that natural 20? Does he get some sort of bonus to that natural 20? Does that make something better about that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, because I'm going to cancel it, if it does anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a critical hit, up to you. Are you canceling it or not?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm canceling it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It still hits, but it's not a critical. You take eight points of bludgeoning damage, reduced to four, and you are grappled. As its tentacle reaches around you, another one that looks like it has a protrusion from its chest, almost like a third arm-- it's a tentacle that wraps around, and grabs at your torso, and is crushing you. You can feel faint bits of it that are scraping at the skin. That finishes their turn. Beau, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The one in front of me is dead. I head to the next one. How far away?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's the one that was attacking you that's right in your face, and there's the one that's grappled Yasha with a tentacle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A different one swam up to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yasha's fine. I'll hit the one in front of me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Two attacks with disadvantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a natural 14. I'm going to use my staff on this one. I hope he is fine with non-magical attacks. Eight damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight damage, all righty. (impact)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did it look like he took the full damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like a person or a creature that had been hit with a staff pretty hard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 just hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh! That's a lot. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 points of damage. Its jaw snaps out of place. It looks like it's trying to bite towards you, but its jaw is limply unable to close.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's still going?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's still going.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Flurry of Blows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ki point. Two more hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ki point. Two more hits. First one hits, barely, but hits with a 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, roll your--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm-hmm! 11 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 damage? You crack again. The jaw actually tears off, and blood's filling. Its eyes are going wide. It's barely holding on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, sorry, six plus four. Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so ten damage, gotcha. All right, that's all right. And your final attack?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was looking at my wrong thing. Hits, and one more time. Please, die. Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. With the last hit as its jaw snapped apart, you grab its head and ram it into your knee, and as you pull the leg back, the face is collapsed inward and it goes limp.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eww.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do that thing where I try to water current its bloody guts away from me so I'm not inhaling it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like, "Oh, god." Okay. That finishes your go. Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many are up still?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One left and it currently has Yasha grappled in the tentacle and trying to crush her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So here's a question, that very first one that we lit up like the Godfather?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With my bonus action, can I reach out, since I was part of the killing of-- are these creatures humanoids?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I reach forward and go: (in a demonic voice) Rise, and I'll Accursed Specter the creature.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may. As the body is floating in the water away, this cold sensation takes the nearby 20-foot radius around it. What little bit of light is filtering through here gets darker and a darkened spectral form emerges from its body. This ghostly wraith emerges from the corpse under Fjord's command.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll say that and go (concussion sound) and throw two more Eldritch Blasts at the one that's remaining.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The other one is a 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Damage on both.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's ten points and eight. So 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 points of damage. Both bolts (impact sounds) into it. It's damaged, but it's still holding on and it's turning towards--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great. I'll take my speed and rush at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dash in with the blade out at the side.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Take a strike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make your strike.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, dope. 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not have disadvantage because of your armor, so that hits. Go ahead and roll damage with your blade.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 1d8 plus-- two points of damage. One plus one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's 1d8 plus one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't you get to add your charisma modifier to the damage bonus?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't see that on here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pretty sure as a hexblade warlock you get to add your charisma bonus to attack and damage rolls, right? Am I wrong about that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I ain't been doing it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have in the past, I'm pretty sure, unless I'm reading this wrong.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought it would be added into the weapon, naturally.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: D&D Beyond?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It should be.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it just says 1d8 plus one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Call tech support.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's based on your strength. Maybe it updated recently and that got reset.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll have to double check because--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My charisma bonus is four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So it would be five more points of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it should be an additional plus four damage, is what it should be.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. So it would be six on a two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, right. I'll fix that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. After the two impacts and the sword slicing through it, it's still standing, but it's hurt. It's still holding onto Yasha and right now it's distracted, trying to figure out which way to go. That finishes your go, Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb and Jester, you're up next.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's left? What's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's one holding onto Yasha.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, Magic Missile.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Toll the Dead at the same time!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 13 on its Toll the Dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah! Doesn't save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the-- 12 damage?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. 22 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of (tolling bell) damage through the water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the tentacle is grappling and crushing your body and you're trying to find a way to force your way through, suddenly, the tentacle just pulls away. You look over towards it; the tentacle isn't attached to anything. It is turned to chum in the water as bits of its scattered body begin to slowly dissipate and disseminate throughout the nearby sea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Toll the Dead vibrations going through the water so all of us can feel it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's just the darkness of the tower below and whatever the inside of it holds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go team!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was good. Anyone need healing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm good.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have a friend.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll bring the specter forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to see this low in the water when there's so little light when it's not moving. Once it shifts, it's like watching a shadow out of the corner of your eye, with these two faintly dull, glowing yellow eyes. It's vaguely humanoid in its shape, but it's almost smoky and amorphous when it shifts and moves and finds its place nearby. Its head lolls around a bit, mimicking the shape and the movement of the creature before it was engaged in combat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I feel bad having Frumpkin be the one that's always putting himself in harm's way, thought I'd give him a friend. I'll send the specter towards the mouth of the tower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You sending it in there by itself?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, why--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys watch as the specter vanishes into the shadow of the tower below.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does anything happen?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you see through its eyes like Frumpkin?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just send him away?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just wanted to send him to the entrance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, just the entrance?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, just to the front.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It moves, comes to the top--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just to make sure the tower's not like (violent chomping).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it does not open its maw and devour your specter.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't make that face! I wouldn't put that past you for one second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fair enough. Yeah, it drifts in and once it hits the mouth of it, it's near impossible to see because it's just black on black until you see its head turn and you can see the very faint light of its eyes. It sits there, awaiting its next command. It's making you uncomfortable.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, no, I'm pretty uncomfortable about all of this. Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not a permanent thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is definitely getting very after-school special for me and the kid just brought out the bag of weed in the after-school special and I'm like, "Oh."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just give it a try.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, the police officer came to our school and talked about this. Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ruh-roh, hey kids.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. (sighs) Yeah, all right, let's do this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's no other entrance on the tower? Just the one? That we see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As far as you can tell, there is just the one entrance.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. We'll move closer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to try and swim along the edges of it, you can look for other entrances.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hold on a minute. Go. Look around the tower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check for Frumpkin, please.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. He'll spiral around, look for any other entrances. Oh jeez, it jumped on the box, cocked. Natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Frumpkin, having a hard time seeing through the clustered seaweed. Around its base-- I mean, with a natural one, yeah, you don't see anything. Frumpkin makes out no shapes or anything within that period. Frumpkin's not used to being an octopus, okay? He still hasn't quite figured it out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's what I've been saying all this time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm a bit faster. I'll go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I summon my octopus back to my head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hang back for a second. I'll use 45 feet of my speed to move forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not in combat right now so we can just--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm still fucking Hasted.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true, though you're getting really close to the end of it. It lasts for a minute so--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, does it? Sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We did some talking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys have been chatting back and forth and doing this, and especially with Frumpkin looking around like that, yeah, Haste has worn off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now I have one level of exhaustion, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you're not in combat anymore.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You just went (gasping), and then it's gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Are you going to do a spiral around it or are you going to go down one side? What are you doing? Are you just stopping?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we above it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are above it. At this point, you're about 60 or so feet above the top of this curved tower.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's at an angle, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's at a slight angle, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Travis, how are you going to handle the shaft?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd like to spiral down, slowly making my way around the top so I can see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Are you doing it stealthily or are you trying to go for speed?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stealthily.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. It'll take you a little bit, but go ahead and roll a stealth check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Start at the base.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I give-- bless you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (mocking Laura in gibberish)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is that for?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You get advantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do get advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Blessing of the Trickster.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's good. Ugh. Nine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nein.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Make a perception check for me, please, as you're keeping an eye out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm also keeping an eye out to see if I see anything come out of the front entrance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you curl down, there are slits. There are narrow peering points at different areas. You do see the occasional window or an opening where somebody could probably squeeze through. At the very base of it, there does appear to be an open doorway.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The top of the tower is open and it continues through the middle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 17 perception.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You're keeping an eye out from the top. As you head down, you see that entranceway, look over, look around and see the other faint bits of windows. You look back down at the door and you see the very edge of something in the door. You see a yellowish-green shape, looks almost-- best I can describe it at this distance is a hint of crustacean that then vanishes into the doorway.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I swim over to the edge of the tower to try and lean up against the side of it. Make myself less obvious out in the open water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You wait for 30 seconds. A minute.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does somebody appear?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing, but you get the sense that something noticed you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, don't want to go in that way. I wave everybody down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I swim down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you all join Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will relay that there is a doorway down near the bottom, but something poked its pretty head out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did it look like?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kind of greenish-yellow. Couldn't quite see, but it kind of looked like an overgrown shrimp, crab-type thing. Kind of crustacean-y.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's weird.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Might just be the local wildlife, right? What are the chances? We could just send our guest here down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: See if it attacks it? Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or we could go through the tunnel.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe we could send your friend in the door at the bottom while we go in the top?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd be fine with that. I will command the specter to move towards the doorway and engage anything it finds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The specter drifts down to the center of the doorway and hangs there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just at the doorway?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does that mean? What did that delayed reaction mean?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I push him inside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The specter vanishes inside.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Commotion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Balls. Ass. Three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you don't hear anything. Caduceus, just instinctually, you hear what sounds like the thrashing of water, the impact of scraping against stone, more thrashing, then silence.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that was the end of your ghost friend.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know, they're pretty resilient, but, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, maybe he won.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. That was the end.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, let's assume then-- shall we assume flanking positions?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we going in the top tunnel or the bottom?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know, if it's crustacean-y and it's treating this tower as a shell, maybe I don't want to fight it in there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you propose?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, it feels like this stuff is always at the bottom or at the end.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about we drop to the floor about 60 feet from the doorway and send in a care package?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, attacks?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Anything ranged.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: See if we get lucky.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll descend to the floor, keeping about 60 feet from the outside of the doorway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Follow behind him and land.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you're both now resting a distance from it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I-- because I've got shit when it comes to range-- cheat the distance and see if I can peek in from the top of the tower down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While they do this? Okay, 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a lack of light-- you have your goggles, which helps-- you can barely make out shapes, and there's a few of them. It's like looking into a boiling pot where there's shapes shifting in different places, clustered. With what little bit you can see at your peripheral, it's like whatever texture the bottom of this temple has, the texture is moving.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How many feet down did you say from the top?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From the top? It's about 60 feet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While you guys sink, I went and peeked through one of those windows and looked down.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I try and giving a look-see too because I have darkvision?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do, too.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, you already have it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go ahead. You might roll higher than I did.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What would the roll be? Is it perception?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make out the same thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I poof a little globule of light in my hand and motion to Beauregard from far away and go--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, they already know we're here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look at Yasha: What do you think? Light or no?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I make three more.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: They do know we're here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I go-- over to Caleb, and Yasha and I look in as he sends them in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you send them in?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How tall is the tower roughly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a little more than 60 feet tall to the peak.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so I will stay 50 or 60 feet away from the tower and I will send one in the top, one in the bottom, and two through windows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Their lower half has four legs that are insect-like, or you could say crab-like if you will, and then the upper torso has two large pincers that are jagged on the inside. Their face-- you don't see eyes; it's this smooth surface with a series of these weird worm-like tentacles that emerge from underneath the mouth that curl. As soon as the light hits, they begin to look around towards it and glancing up and they have all backed into it and that shape that you were seeing before was all three of them clustered together and rotating and moving in the space.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But they're backing away from the light?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're not backing away from it. They're back-to-back, looking and preparing for whatever is the source of this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got a fluffernutter ready to go?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do not.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I don't even know why you're down here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I can make them laugh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who's within 30 feet?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You are. You are Nott. Yasha.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 30 feet from you or from the temple?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Who's within 30 feet of me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I might be. You're always back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think you would benefit from this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're on the floor, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You want heavy in combat, so you would want--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have explosive arrows, but I don't think they'll work underwater.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How far up are Yasha and I from the floor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are about 50 or so feet, let's say. If you want to get closer.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we'll drop down and join Jester and co.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Before we mount this attack, I'm going to swim up to Caleb and say: I'm glad you forgot about us before, it means you're thinking about them, but I won't stop thinking about you and I'll give him one of the healing potions. Take this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we about to do this now? I'm going to Bless, taking a cue from Caduceus, on Yasha, Beau, and Fjord.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks, friend.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's that do again?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That gives you a d4 to add to your attack rolls and saving throws.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mark down your Bless.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Right as it begins.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Is everyone gathering on the floor?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've all descended down to the floor of the ocean about roughly 50, 60 feet from this open doorway that leads inside the temple. As you have your spells prepared, ready to delve inside, you take a breath of the deep ocean water in your lungs and exhale its thick, cold liquid and steel yourself for us to pick up in the new year.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I knew it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck. Did that Accursed Specter do any damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, no, it did some.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh good, okay! Good job, Carl.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm picturing those big creatures that are in The Dark Crystal. You know what I'm talking about?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what you saw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh fuck, that's way scarier--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey! Look at that!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what you'll get to see next week.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, not next week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or no, sorry, in three weeks. Next year.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Put seahorses instead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What date are we starting back up again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The 10th I think?

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: The 10th.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe it's the 10th.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, we'll pick up for that. Ah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit, I'm excited!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bless! Oh, I love Bless.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my goodness. Yeah, that's cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bless and Bane, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bless and Bane. Two underappreciated spells.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's too much of that expression, Sam, tonight. It's been glaring at me the entire time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look at that forked tongue.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, are we going to talk about the Riegel in the room?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the fuck is going on?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm half-devil.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How do you have a dimple-- you have a movie star chin dimple. It's right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got ass-tongue.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The tongue is saving a woman tied to a railroad track.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The baby's butt coming out of your mouth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. It's a front-bottom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well guys. Thank you so much.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you, Matt!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ashley, I missed having you here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This is so fun.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We missed you so much!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh gosh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What a great 2018, guys.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey, what a great 2018!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not a bad year. A stressful and crazy year, but a very good year.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sleep for a hundred years.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, seriously.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Weeks of sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll be back in a few weeks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stay tuned for tomorrow night for Liam's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, for Liam's one-shot!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The madness.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It was the best.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Still littered with candy canes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love you, guys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Love you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Love you every year together.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Merry Christmas.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Merry Christmas. Happy holidays. Happy holidays to you guys. Man, we're going to miss you, but we'll be back soon! We'll keep tabs; we'll see you on the internet. In the meantime--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Merry Christmas!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's my wife, ladies and gentlemen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Boof!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was my wife.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Merry Christmas.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And a Happy New Year!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Enjoy. Know we love you very much and is it Thursday in three weeks yet? Good night. Happy holidays, Happy New Year! [music]
